About Me

Here are some interesting things about me!

BIO

I am a software developer seeking employment as a full-stack developer. I am a graduate of the Kentucky Community and Technical College System, where I earned a degree in Computer and Information Technology, with a focus on Software Development. I am currently located in Lexington Kentucky, where I own a home and live with my wife and three dogs.

Skills and Expertise

I have experience in various web technologies, which I have acquired both in school, and through online resources I have studied on my own. Some of the skills I possess include: HTML, CSS, Javascript, Sass and PHP. I have also worked with frameworks such as Bootstrap, Vue, Vuetify and jQuery. In addition, I have built mobile applications for the Android platform using Android Studio and Java. I am also working hard to learn enterprise frameworks such as Spring MVC for Java development, and ASP.NET.

Hobbies

When I'm not working to improve my skills as programmer, I enjoy a number of hobbies. My favorite thing to do outside of coding is playing video games. My favorite game at the moment is a First Person Arena Shooter called Overwatch. I play this and most other games on my desktop computer, which I built from parts. I thoroughly enjoy taking apart computers and putting them back together, or building one from scratch. However, I like to get outside and enjoy nice weather when I get the chance. I enjoy playing a number of sports, especially softball with a group of friends on the weekends. I also enjoy camping or hiking with my wife and my dogs!
